page.title: 07EVENTS
page.content: In Collingtree the 22nd of June we had an Antique Fair and a Fish and Chip Disco.Some of the children were helping the games.The games we ran were: The Treasure Hunt,Car Game,Money in the Pot,Guess the Sweets in a jar,Throw the Welly! and Knocking down the can.in Milton there was a May Day. A May Day celebration is a wooden pole with colourful ribbons on it.Then children skip round the pole weaving the ribbons.The children skip round one way to weave it and the otherway to unweave it.Also there was a procession had bands and floats.The Guides and the Brownies dress up as funny characters. The people who watch the procession sometimes thron money for charity.All the money which is collected might go towards the "SAVE THE CHILDREN" fund or an old peoples home.
